title: Swinger 101
desc: New to the lifestyle?  Just curious about being a swinger? Our forums have been met with a very positive reception and we are now holding two forums each month: the forum on Thursdays is open to all while the forum held on Fridays is reserved for couples and single females only. ? Hosted by Jack & Jill, Swinger 101, is the perfect informational introduction to the lifestyle. If you are one of these hesitant or just curious people, Swinger 101 is the place to start. The forum will explain the swinger lifestyle and what it?s all about. It?s being offered free of charge, and Jack & Jill will be there to answer any questions you have. At the very least, Swinger 101 will expand your knowledge of the lifestyle, but it may even open a whole new world of possibilities. Broken into 3 sections, Swinger 101 events run about 90 minutes long.
